translations: [法] 保释；帮助脱离困境；把水舀出（船）（bail 的过去式和过去分词）

sentences.sentence: He was bailed to appear on 26 August.
He has been jailed eight times. Each time, friends bailed him out.
sentences.translation: 他已经蹲过八次监狱。每次，朋友们都把他保释出来。

sentences.sentence: Ryan's late goal bailed out his team.
sentences.translation: 瑞安在比赛后阶段得的一分拯救了他的球队。
